title: Can we have another just... human with a weapon and magical powers?
body:
I get you wanna make 5 million extremely "unique" champions and a bunch of monsters but... I am really looking forward to the next champion who is just a person with magic and weapons and fits the whole fantasy theme. Maybe that female void human people asked for a lot back in the day or... just a wizard or knight or something?

Just... something I would like to see.

Runeterra really isn't a standard fantasy setting, though.  This is a setting that has air-ships, magically powered machines, and technologically augmented individuals.  And, frankly, it has always been like this to some degree or another.  If we're talking 'human with magic/tool' then we have:
